newsitem.title: UK: Oxford Molecular in cancer drug alliance.
newsitem.headline: Oxford Molecular in cancer drug alliance.

text.p: Oxford Molecular Group Plc said on Thursday it had struck a long-term alliance with privately-owned Prolifix Ltd aimed at novel drugs for cancer and other proliferative diseases.

Oxford Molecular said it would provide Prolifix with proprietary molecular modelling services aimed at developing drug candidates that mimic natural blockers of key cell receptors used in prolifertion.
Profilix will cover research costs and give Oxford Molecular milestone and royalty payments. -- London Newsroom +44 171 5427717
